content.raw:
When this is all sorted out please be sure it gets explained fully on the qual1 web page. I've been following these comments but their location is not obvious. Even knowing this thread I had to hunt for it late last night. 

Personally, if the standard transforms aren't handling the inverted image situation those transforms are wrong and should be fixed. 

I'll be chiming in with my own results shortly. Just got the transforms and console messages working last night so am ready to test my outputs.
